flowchart TB
    subgraph AXIL_Channels["AXIL Master Channels"]
        AR["AR Channel\n(Read Address)"]
        R["R Channel\n(Read Data)"]
    end

    subgraph axil4_master_rd_mon["axil4_master_rd_mon"]
        subgraph Base["Monitor Base"]
            TRANS["Transaction Tracker"]
            TIMEOUT["Timeout Detection"]
        end

        subgraph Reporter["Reporter"]
            PKT["Packet Generation"]
        end
    end

    subgraph Output["Monitor Bus Output"]
        MONBUS["mon_*\n(64-bit packets)"]
    end

    AR --> TRANS
    R --> TRANS
    TRANS --> TIMEOUT
    TIMEOUT --> PKT
    PKT --> MONBUS
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
